name: NSWindow.OcclusionState
desc: Specifies whether the window is occluded.

items.name: static var visible: NSWindow.OcclusionState
items.desc: If set, at least part of the window is visible; if not set, the entire window is occluded. A window that has a nonrectangular shape can be entirely occluded onscreen, but if its bounding box falls into a visible region, the window is considered to be visible. Note that a completely transparent window may also be considered visible.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates an occlusion state using the given raw value.
